abstract: In the journal Foreign Policy, Nouriel Roubini (a k a Dr. Doom) and Ian Bremmer talk about why Occupy Wall Street actually matters.

lead_paragraph: In Foreign Policy, Nouriel Roubini (a k a Dr. Doom) and Ian Bremmer talk about why Occupy Wall Street actually matters. Roubini says:

headline.main: What Occupy Wall Street Tells Us About the Global Economy
